description: Situated in the Imagna valley, this welcoming, family-run restaurant serves delicious regional specialities alongside traditional Italian favourites, including a few fish options. Highlights include the dried-cod cannelloni, soft braised “guancialino” and the unmissable zabaglione mousse with sbrisolona-cake crumbs and marzipan ice-cream.
